Designed for: Long-lived data with changing or unknown access patterns
Other considerations: Monitoring and automation fees per object apply. No retrieval fees.
Per GB retrieval fees apply. Not resilient to the loss of the Availability Zone.

Designed for: Long-term data archiving with retrieval times ranging from minutes to hours
Other considerations: Per GB retrieval fees apply. You must first restore archived objects before you can access them. For more information, see Restoring Archived Objects.

Designed for: Archiving rarely accessed data with a default retrieval time of 12 hours
Other considerations: Per GB retrieval fees apply. You must first restore archived objects before you can access them. For more information, see Restoring Archived Objects.
